questions.question_text: Which of the following should be given the HIGHEST priority during an information security post-incident review?

choices.C: Evaluating the performance of incident response team members
choices.B: Documenting actions taken in sufficient detail

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: A
A. Evaluating incident response effectiveness

Evaluating incident response effectiveness is crucial because it helps assess whether the incident was handled properly and whether the organization's security measures and incident response procedures are adequate. This assessment can help identify areas for improvement in the incident response process and in the overall security posture of the organization.

Selected Answer: A
A. Evaluating incident response effectiveness.

Evaluating incident response effectiveness is of the highest priority during an information security post-incident review.

Selected Answer: A
A. Evaluating incident response effectiveness

questions.question_text: Which of the following is the BEST course of action when an online company discovers a network attack in progress?

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: B
B. Isolate the affected network segment.

choices.A: Shut off all network access points.
choices.C: Dump all event logs to removable media.
choices.D: Enable trace logging on all events.
